hasDitaContent.@value: Aceclofenac is predicted to increase the risk of renal impairment when given with clodronate. Manufacturer makes no recommendation.

hasDitaContent.@value: Oral antacids decrease the absorption of oral clodronate. Manufacturer advises avoid antacids for 2 hours before or 1 hour after clodronate.
